statements: UPDATE historical_text_analysis SET analysis_result = '{}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE historical_text_analysis SET text_data = 'New text data' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE historical_text_analysis SET text_data='Updated text data', analysis_result='{
}' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE historical_text_analysis SET analysis_result='{
status':'completed' ,
data':'positive' }' , text_data='New updated text data' WHERE text_data LIKE '%analyze%' AND id=2;
UPDATE historical_text_data_pattern_analysis SET pattern_type='regex' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE language_generation_models SET generation_pattern='n-gram' WHERE model_id=2;
UPDATE historical_text_data_pattern_analysis SET pattern_type = 'regex', analysis_result = '{"accuracy": 0.85}' WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE language_generation_models SET generation_pattern = '<start> <entity> <verb> <noun>', model_config = '{"temperature": 0.5}' WHERE model_id = 2002;
UPDATE historical_texts SET text_content='New content', text_date='2022-06-15' WHERE text_id=1;
UPDATE language_models SET model_name='New model name', model_accuracy=0.85 WHERE model_id=3;
UPDATE historical_texts SET text_content = 'Updated Text Content' WHERE text_id = 1;
UPDATE language_patterns SET pattern_analysis = 'Improved analysis' WHERE pattern_id = 3;
UPDATE text_data_pattern SET content = 'New content' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE language_models SET version = 2.5, description = 'Updated version' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE text_data_pattern SET content = 'New content example!' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE language_models SET version = 2.5, description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE historical_text_data SET text_data = 'Updated text data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE language_models SET last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE historical_text_data SET text_data = 'Updated text data', timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE language_models SET description = 'New model description' WHERE id = 3;
